tests.name: "only lower case"
tests.cmd: bash pangram.sh "the quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog"

tests.name: "missing the letter 'x'"
tests.cmd: bash pangram.sh "a quick movement of the enemy will jeopardize five gunboats"

tests.name: "missing the letter 'h'"
tests.cmd: bash pangram.sh "five boxing wizards jump quickly at it"

tests.name: "with numbers"
tests.cmd: bash pangram.sh "the 1 quick brown fox jumps over the 2 lazy dogs"

tests.name: "missing letters replaced by numbers"
tests.cmd: bash pangram.sh "7h3 qu1ck brown fox jumps ov3r 7h3 lazy dog"

tests.name: "mixed case and punctuation"
tests.cmd: bash pangram.sh "\"Five quacking Zephyrs jolt my wax bed.\""

tests.name: "case insensitive"
tests.cmd: bash pangram.sh "the quick brown fox jumps over with lazy FX"
